column4: is it possible to upgrade straight to the most recent version of ubuntu, or do i have to incrementally upgrade through all the intermediary versions?
yeah, you have to update through each version

if you're going through more than one version it might be better to just do a fresh install because things can get messed up in upgrades and most stuff is easy to backup and will be exactly the same when you restore it
- as in, the system won't work? i have practically nothing on this machine
